channel.title: Things to get into on the computer?
channel.description: What are some things to do on the computer that are fun and productive? I'm not looking to pay for anything, if I have to I won't pay more than $20, I don't really want it to be anything programming related, nor do I want it to be any of your common games (such as RS and WoW), I love android hacking/developing, but the phone I was messing with has undergone hardware malfuctions and is no longer useable, but anyways. What are some fun hobbies I can do/start over the computer?

item.title: Things to get into on the computer?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I spend most of my time on the computer reading news and learning about stuff I enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: Things to get into on the computer?
item.dc:creator: @ictbguud ictbguud
item.description:
@ictbguud wrote:

If you want, do this to your computer. (Makes your computer look cool and while doing it, it takes lots of time away ;D )

Okay, download WindowBlinds (Free trial or get the full thing or get a crack) at:

Download.com

WindowBlinds

WindowBlinds version 8 brings a couple new features that include a brand new interface, better support for Windows 8, and SkinStudio, a theme designer that

Pick one of there themes to change the taskbar and stuff. (I use the SaberTooth one or somewhat…) Want more themes? Go here:

http://www.wincustomize.com/explore/windowblinds

Get RocketDock and ObjectDock at:

http://rocketdock.com/DOWNLOAD

And

stardock.com

ObjectDock : Software from Stardock

ObjectDock is the most popular animated dock for Windows.

Now, download Zmatrix (I think it only works for XP but you could try if you have vista or windows 7 or such…) Get it at:

http://zmatrix.sourceforge.net/ (It’s a program, when you run it… It makes your desktop like Enter the Matrix numbers thing. Get a solid green desktop background if you want it to look JUST like them things from matrix…

Get custom icons for like the recyclin bin, Start menu, folders, my computer… All kinds at:

http://www.wincustomize.com/explore/icons

If you get a .PNG file and it wont work as a .ICO file for the icon, just download Gconvert 5 at:

http://www.gdgsoft.com/download/gconvert.aspx

(Drag the .PNG into the program and you should be able to figure out the rest…)

Sorry if it’s lots of work… But make my computer look cool ;P…

Cheers!

Read full topic
item.source: Things to get into on the computer?

cough my sig cough

I also have a crack for sony vegas if you want it. All free, no mula. ;o
[/quote]
I’ll probably be getting that Camista you got when I get the time to do all that stuffs

badsite is always fun to be on, there’s a bunch of sections (non-hacking-related) and since there’s a lot of activity you are continue posting

Never heard of it…

you could use steam and download free games.

Already have a couple, they get boring though, huge MMORPG’s aren’t any fun when you have no friends… Just stuck walking around in circles waiting for something cool to happen.[/quote]I suggest getting Vegas then to do more professional editing.

item.title: Things to get into on the computer?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:3, topic:459325”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=562231.msg4099886#msg4099886 date=1347320560]
Create and run a forum board, that’s pretty fun and it eats up your time.
[/quote]
Sadly enough I have one, it never took off though. I have like 13 members.[/quote]
Oh, that sucks :(.

How about joining just a general forums board and discussing anything and everything? I’m sure meeting some new online friends would keep you occupied for a while.

Read full topic
